articles.title: Apex Legends Mobile will be available in 10 countries next week
articles.description: Apex Legends Mobile will soon be available in 10 countries as part of a "limited regional launch." People in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, Indonesia, Mexico, Peru, Argentina, and Colombia will all be able to download the game.
articles.content: Apex Legends Mobile will soon be available in more countries. The game first debuted in a closed beta last year that was available in a few countries, but starting next week, the game will be available in a “limited regional launch” as a free downloa... [1766 chars]

articles.title: Emiliano Sala suffered carbon monoxide poisoning before dying in plane crash
articles.description: The inquest into the death of Argentina footballer Emiliano Sala, who had just become Cardiff City's record signing when he died in a plan crash, heard on Tuesday that he had been overcome by toxic levels of carbon monoxide poisoning prior to his death

articles.title: Argentina dinosaur might have been armless but surely not harmless
articles.description: A team of paleontologists in Argentina has recently found a new armless species of dinosaur called Guemesia ochoai. Their findings were published in the Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology.
articles.content: A team of paleontologists in Argentina has recently published their findings of a new but armless species of dinosaur called Guemesia ochoai. Prior to their extinction, 66 million years ago, these dinosaurs are believed to have roamed across Europe, ... [3467 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's farm sector asks court to suspend grain export taxes
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Argentina's farm sector has asked a federal court to rule taxes levied on grain exports as unconstitutional, a challenge that threatens a key source of the country's tax revenue.Major farm group Argentine Rural Society (SRA) said late on Monday it had filed a case arguing that grain export taxes have been illegally charged since Jan. 1,
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Argentina's farm sector has asked a federal court to rule taxes levied on grain exports as unconstitutional, a challenge that threatens a key source of the country's tax revenue.

articles.title: New Tiny-Armed Carnivorous Dinosaur Discovered In Argentina
articles.description: A new species of dinosaur, a distant relative of the Carnotaurus, has been discovered in the South American country.
articles.content:
A new member of the abelisauridae family of dinosaurs has been discovered. This group of dinos are large therapod carnivores characterized by their incredibly small forearms – so tiny that they are often considered armless.
The new species, Guemesia ... [2423 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans hit highest in more than a week; corn, wheat jump
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a fourth consecutive session on Tuesday and hit their highest in more than a week on concerns over dry weather in Brazil and Argentina curbing yields.Corn rose to a seven-month top, while wheat jumped more than 2% to a four-week high.FUNDAMENTALS* The most-active soybean contract on the Chicago Board of Trade

SINGAPORE, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a fourth consecutive session on Tuesday and hit their highest in more than a week on concerns over dry weather in Brazil and Argentina curbing yields.

articles.title: Colombia legalises abortion in move celebrated as ‘historic victory’ by campaigners
articles.description: Colombia has decriminalised abortion during the first 24 weeks of pregnancy, following rulings in Mexico and Argentina that improve access to abortion
articles.content:
Colombia has decriminalised abortion during the first 24 weeks of pregnancy, adding to a recent string of legal victories for reproductive rights in Latin America.
